messages.title: Lib Dem Guarantee: Putting 3000 more police on our Streets
messages.content: The only way to cut crime is to put more police on the streets. This would mean that the police would tackle 766 more arrests.

messages.title: £700 off income tax
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats will cut the average pensioner's income tax bill by £700, cutting almost 4 million tax bills by £100. This freezes pension and pensioner's income on low incomes will no longer have to pay any income tax at all.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Your local Lib Dem team have been taking positive action to tackle speeding traffic in our area.
Local Councillors Les Byrom and Carmel Preston inspect the 20mph School Zone signage on Meols Cop Road
Your Lib Dem Team are talking action to tackle ongoing problems with parking throughout our area.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Action to fix our roads & pavements
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Councillor Sue McGuire and your Lib Dem Team have been very busy reporting potholes and road repairs.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It's a two horse race 2005 General Election Result, Lib Dem 15255, Con 19093, Lab 5277 in Southport

issues.health: Lib Dem Guarantee: Putting 3000 more police on our Streets

housing.content: The Liberal Democrats will cut the average pensioner's income tax bill by £700, cutting almost 4 million tax bills by £100.

politicalExperience.achievements: Action on Road Safety, Tackling speeding, Working to improve parking, Action to fix our roads & pavements.

images.caption: Councillors Les Byrom, Carmel Preston and Sue McGuire continue to fight for improved health services in Southport including the on-going battle to allow our children to be treated locally.
Councillor Sue McGuire working with local residents and the North Meols Civic Society laying woodchippings on footpath 7 with the Scout.
Councillor Sue McGuire inspecting the dangerous parking on Sandon Street and surrounding areas.
Working to tackle flooding and potholes in our area including Alexandra Road and Cambridge Road.
Taking action to erect bench seats and bus stops across our area.
Working to tackle the litter around the Marine Lake.
